# TagProvider.AddOrUpdateRange method

Adds or updates a set of tags to the provider. If an equivalent tag already exists, it will be replaced. Any tag's related and parents, if available, will also be added or updated.

```csharp
public void AddOrUpdateRange(IEnumerable<Tag> tags)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| tags | The set of tags to add or update in the provider. |
